violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: Hva kan jeg hjelpe deg med?
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.05 (foreground color: #ffffff, background color: #f5f9fc, font size: 14.3pt (19px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

violations.description: Ensure elements have alternative text or a role of none or presentation

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.description: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
violations.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

nodes.html: <input id="q" name="q" type="search" aria-label="Søketekst" class="block border-1 border-black py-2.5 px-5 w-full z-20 text-lg placeholder-gray-900 text-gray-900 bg-white-50 rounded hover:bg-fk-blue-light focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-300" placeholder="Skriv hva du trenger hjelp med" required="">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks
